message.content: cs.SD, cs.SD is the sub-category for speech processing and recognition. The paper specifically addresses the problem of speaker-independent speech separation, which is a sub-topic of speech processing. Other likely sub-categories could include cs.CL (computational linguistics) and cs.LG (machine learning) as the paper proposes a novel deep learning framework for speech separation. cs.CV (computer vision) and cs.AI (artificial intelligence) are less likely as they are not directly related to speech processing, although they may be indirectly related through the use of neural networks.
